comments.body:
Usually, most companies looking to recruit CSE kids also allow ECE kids to take part in their placement tests. A few also allow EEE, but the intake is lesser. If you want to sit for the same companies as the CSE kids, then ECE is your best bet. 
Can't compare between the branches though since I'm from neither. But from whatever I've heard, ECE is really hard and EEE is a little easier.

You mean eee is hard and ece is comparatively easier?
Cause ive heard eee is the hardest lol
